content.query:
-- CRIA FORMATO DE ARQUIVO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

-- CRIA EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'fabio_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [fabio_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://fabio@adlstrnsolar.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO
-- CRIA A TABELA
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.D_CATEGORIA (
	[ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	[NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'bronze/CATEGORIA/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [fabio_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

-- VISUALIZA DADOS
SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.D_CATEGORIA
GO
